price: 20. Ir (alyvuogių) medį, kuris dygsta iš Sinai Kalno, kuris augina (gamina) aliejų, ir (tai yra) pagardas valgytojams.
arabic: وَشَجَرَةٗ تَخۡرُجُ مِن طُورِ سَيۡنَآءَ تَنۢبُتُ بِٱلدُّهۡنِ وَصِبۡغٖ لِّلۡأٓكِلِينَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: washajaratan takhruju min ṭūri saynāa tanbutu bil-duh'ni waṣib'ghin lil'ākilīna
